headline: Advanced Energy, IBD Stock Of The Day, Breaks Out. So Do Several Chip Peers.
summary: Advanced Energy is Monday's IBD Stock Of The Day. Chip-gear stocks are collectively on the rise amid the continued data center boom.

headline: BofA says these are the best 7 AI chip stocks to own in 2026
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America remains “constructive on AI-related semi, memory and semicap stocks despite expected volatility,” highlighting seven names it sees as best positioned for 2026.

headline: Assessing KLA (KLAC) Valuation After Strong Q3 Beat And AI Outlook As Shares Slip Slightly
summary: KLA (KLAC) shares slipped 1.5% after a third quarter that delivered double digit revenue and EPS growth versus expectations, putting the focus on how AI demand and export limits might shape the story from here. See our latest analysis for KLA. That post earnings dip sits against a strong recent run, with KLA’s 90 day share price return of 17.49% and 1 year total shareholder return of 86.20% pointing to momentum that has been building rather than fading. If KLA’s AI driven story has your...

headline: Strong AI-Driven Quarter and Dividend Spotlight Might Change The Case For Investing In KLA (KLAC)
summary: KLA Corporation recently reported a strong third quarter with double-digit year-over-year revenue and EPS growth that exceeded analyst expectations, while its inclusion among 2025’s best-performing dividend stocks and an analyst upgrade highlighted continued interest in its AI-linked chipmaking tools despite ongoing U.S.-China export restrictions. Management’s confidence that KLA is on pace for solid relative revenue growth versus the semiconductor industry in 2025 adds context to how...
